__e: Dearly beloved, we have gathered here tonight to pay our final respects to Dylan, a breather who didn't have enough good sense to keep his dumb ass retired.
My dearest friends, I'm done talking, and you can take it as you like:
All your friends have finished with you. I've got you now.
Well, if you gentle people can manage without me, I shall go to sleep. Good night. I'm freezing.
My dear children, if I could only see you now.
I beg you, dear children, come to the house of God.
I trust you, my beloved children, and wish you a profitable and happy new year.
Honey, I think I told you, just look at the most expensive ones, the prettiest ones--
They must be very expensive, and if something should happen...
We wanted to be the cheapest bid to get the work. That's why we're doing it this way.
Ladies and gentlemen, esteemed colleagues, I'll conclude with this.
Now the truth comes out. This picture belongs to this spot. My beloved colleagues, now that you're all here.
Dear colleagues, thanks for coming again and what a pleasure to see you again.
My dear brothers and sisters, we now ask God to give this child new life in abundance... through water and the Holy Spirit.
Dear family, the books arrived safely.
My dear brothers and sisters. For a long time I believed that God is Truth.
What is happening to us reminds me of what happened to St. Paul.
Dear brethren I leave such worldly matters to younger men.
Dear brethren, I have never previously exercised my right to convene you.
So many of them have left a family back home, a wife, children... and they've come here to die like dogs in the mud to send a little gold
I just know that at a time like this... my uncle Phil is extremely happy to have his two loving parents here with him.
"Dear folks, I hope you are both well.
